summary: This bill, the Future Long Range Assault Aircraft Medical Evacuation and Special Operations Procurement Act of 2025, authorizes the Secretary of the Army to expedite the development and procurement of medical evacuation and special operations configurations of the Future Long Range Assault Aircraft (FLRAA). It focuses on enhancing patient care, operational reach, and special operations capabilities by integrating advanced technologies. The bill mandates coordination with stakeholders and a report to Congress detailing development progress, timelines, and funding needs, while also stating that no new funds are authorized.
